name: @preact-wmr-twind-zero/wmr1
description: Preact WMR Twind 'zero runtime' monorepo - WMR demo 1
author: Daniel Weck (https://github.com/danielweck)

scripts.build-no-prerender: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG="*,-babel*" wmr build
scripts.build_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG="*,-babel*" wmr build --prerender && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-github_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG="*,-babel*" BUILD_FOR_GITHUB=1 wmr build --prerender && mv ./dist/preact-wmr-twind-zero/* ./dist/ && rimraf ./dist/preact-wmr-twind-zero && rimraf ./dist/*.ts && rimraf ./dist/chunks/prerender* && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-github-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-viz: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG="*,-babel*" wmr build --prerender --visualize && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.lint:all: pnpm lint:eslint && pnpm lint:stylelint && pnpm lint:prettier
